item.title: ZOPP: A Framework of Zero-shot Offboard Panoptic Perception for Autonomous Driving
item.description: ZOPP: A groundbreaking framework for zero-shot offboard panoptic perception in autonomous driving, enabling high-quality 3D scene understanding without human labeling.
